technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates enlarged, no hydronephrosis.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 10.36 bpm.
Prostate is mildly thickened; volume approximately 24.03 cc.
Uterus appears isoechoic; endometrial thickness measures 9.08 mm.
Testes are normal with normal vascularity.
Urinary bladder is normal, no intraluminal lesions.
Thyroid gland shows ill-defined echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
